After people in his town start turning up dead, a grumpy landlord is visited by a man who recounts an unsolved serial murder case from 30 years ago.

description: To compensate for her unhappy marriage, young duchess Georgiana Spencer begins a scandalous affair with politician Charles Grey.

title: Una
description: A young woman tracks down the older man who preyed on her as a child, forcing them both to confront the damage done by what happened 15 years earlier.

title: Beyond All Boundaries
description: As the 2011 Cricket World Cup begins, three Indians demonstrate their passion and the sacrifices they've made for the country's most popular sport.

title: Born to Be Free
description: Casting a light on the mistreatment of sea mammals, this documentary follows the plight of 18 Beluga whales kept in captivity for years.

title: Celluloid Man
description: This documentary chronicles the philosophy and life's work of archivist P.K. Nair, who made a mission of preserving Indian cinema’s rich history.

title: Couples Counseling
description: A seasoned couples therapist comes to realize she might need help with her own marriage after meeting a new pair of young clients.

title: Dancing Quietly
description: After years of battling a deep depression, a young woman attempts to pass an important exam with the help of a fellow student.

title: Deuces
description: Assigned to go undercover to take down an impenetrable crime ring, a detective finds himself falling under the sway of its enigmatic leader.

title: Don't Look Down
description: Aided by dramatic reconstructions and archive footage, Sir Richard Branson recounts his daring attempts to break hot air balloon records.

title: Elaan
description: Journalist Naresh is hired to probe illegal activities on an island. When he's captured, a fellow prisoner gives him a ring with magic powers.

title: Five Nights in Maine
description: After his wife dies in a car accident, a grief-stricken man visits his estranged mother-in-law in Maine, where they try to help each other heal.

title: Killa
description: Growing up poses challenges for Chinu when he moves from city to country and encounters a youth culture far different from what he's used to.

title: Lavender
description: After discovering old fractures in her skull, a photographer recovering from amnesia becomes increasingly haunted by a sinister childhood secret.

title: Ouran High School Host Club
description: New student Haruhi stumbles on the Ouran High School Host Club, an all-male group that makes money by entertaining the girls of the school.

title: Salaakhen
description: Two close childhood friends take drastically different paths in life, but meet by chance years later and fall in love, unaware of their past bond.

title: Skins
description: Deformed, disfigured characters must find a way to deal with society shunning their differences in this darkly comic social drama.

title: The Tenth Man
description: After spending much of his adult life in New York, an affable economist returns home to Buenos Aires and tries to reconnect with his aloof father.

title: Toro
description: Ex-con Toro's brother and former partner in crime makes a desperate plea for help that may put Toro back behind bars ... if he survives at all.

title: Frank and Cindy
description: A student filmmaker vengefully turns his camera on his bitter mom and washed-up rock star stepdad in this dramedy based on a documentary.

title: Iverson
description: This unfiltered documentary follows the rocky life and stratospheric career of Allen Iverson, an NBA icon who left an indelible mark on the sport.

title: Jeremy Scott: The People's Designer
description: The journey of fashion designer Jeremy Scott from humble roots on a Missouri farm to creative director of Moschino is charted in this documentary.

title: Once Upon a Time
description: In this fantasy series, a young woman is drawn to a small Maine town and discovers that it's filled with elements of the fairy tale world.

title: Gotham
description: Long before he was commissioner, rookie cop James Gordon takes on Gotham City crime and corruption to avenge the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents.

title: Naruto
description: Guided by the spirit demon within him, orphaned Naruto learns to harness his powers as a ninja in this anime adventure series.

title: Toast of London
description: After a divorce and fatal career move, a classically trained British stage actor navigates single life with his odd roommate and takes on horrid jobs.

title: Hemlock Grove
description: Secrets are just a part of daily life in the small Pennsylvania town of Hemlock Grove, where the darkest evils hide in plain sight.

title: Glitter Force Doki Doki
description: Four girls summon their inner superheroes to defend Earth and the magical kingdom of Splendorius from King Mercenare and his minions.

title: Mars
description: Fact meets fiction in this docudrama chronicling the journey of a spacecraft crew as it embarks in 2033 on a mission to colonize the red planet.

title: Supernatural
description: Siblings Dean and Sam crisscross the country, investigating paranormal activity and picking fights with demons, ghosts and monsters.

title: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
description: A mysterious "time master" from the future unites an unlikely group of superheroes and villains to save the world from a powerful evil.

title: Supergirl
description: To avert a disaster, Kara Danvers reveals her powers and true identity: She is Superman's cousin, now known as Supergirl, protector of National City.

title: Riverdale
description: While navigating the troubled waters of sex, romance, school and family, teen Archie and his gang become entangled in a dark Riverdale mystery.

title: The Flash
description: A forensics expert who wakes from a coma with amazing new powers squares off against forces threatening the city in this live-action superhero romp.

title: Velvet
description: In 1950s Spain, the heir to a fashion house romances a beautiful seamstress who works for the company, despite the objections of his family.

title: Arrow
description: Based on DC Comics' Green Arrow, an affluent playboy becomes a vengeful superhero, saving the city from villains armed with just a bow and arrows.

title: Royal Pains
description: Dr. Hank Lawson unexpectedly gets a career upgrade as a freelance physician treating New York's aristocratic upper crust in their posh Hamptons homes.

title: Call the Midwife
description: This period drama set in impoverished East London in the 1950s follows a newly qualified midwife and her colleagues at a nursing convent.

title: Father Brown
description: A modest, compassionate priest doubles as an effective crime solver in this series based on the short stories by G.K. Chesterton.

title: Hoff the Record
description: TV star David Hasselhoff hopes to reboot his career in the U.K., but both his comeback plans and his personal life keep going off the rails.

title: World of Winx
description: The reality show "WOW!" engages the Winx in their mission, starting an undercover, worldly journey in order to make talented kids' dreams come true.

title: Degrassi: Next Class
description: Degrassi's next generation of high-tech newbies and returning students navigates real-world high school drama. If you're a teen, this is your life.

title: Kuromukuro
description: When mecha attack a research center, its students, pilots, and researchers must fight back with the help of mysterious artifacts and a young samurai.

title: Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee
description: Jerry Seinfeld's roving talk show combines coffee, laughs and vintage cars into quirky, caffeine-fueled adventures with the sharpest minds in comedy.

title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
description: The Cat in the Hat is back – and this time, he's teaching Sally and her brother, Nick, some awfully nifty things to think about!

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: After both suffer physical damage – brothers Edward and Alphonse battle nefarious forces to try to reclaim their bodies in this supernatural anime.

title: Merlin
description: This family-oriented retelling of the King Arthur legend finds Merlin arriving in Camelot, where he hones his magic skills with the help of his uncle.

title: Abnormal Summit
description: Led by a trio of Korean celebs, a multinational panel of men engage in – usually – lighthearted debates on issues that surround Korea and beyond.

title: The Great British Baking Show
description: A talented batch of amateur bakers face off in a 10-week competition, whipping up their best dishes in the hopes of being named the U.K.'s best.

title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
description: When Paris is in peril, Marinette becomes Ladybug. Little does she know, her school crush Adrien is actually Cat Noir, another city-saving superhero.

title: Sacred Games
description: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

title: Men on a Mission
description: Male celebs play make-believe as high schoolers, welcoming star transfer students every week and engaging in battles of witty humor and slapstick.

title: Leyla and Mecnun
description: Destiny brings Mecnun and Leyla together as newborns, and again years later. Despite unexpected turns in Mecnun's zany life, Leyla remains a constant.
